title: Gavekal's Kroeber: China Needs a Consumer Led Economy (Audio)
itunes:title: Gavekal's Kroeber: China Needs a Consumer Led Economy (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Arthur Kroeber, Founding Partner of Gavekal Dragonomics, a China-focused economic research consultancy in Beijing, and a fellow of the Brookings-Tsinghua Center for Public Policy, on his new book, "China's Economy: What Everyone Needs To Know."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
